content: This is a **list of Singaporean billionaires** based on an annual assessment of wealth and assets compiled and published by *[Forbes](/wiki/Forbes)* magazine in 2024. Most of them are businessmen. Many of them got their wealth from the real estate industry. ## 2024 Singaporean billionaires list SG RankNameNet worth ([USD](/wiki/USD))Source of wealth1[Li Xiting](/wiki/Li_Xiting)15.1
